
chr_notrace

   Deactivates the standard or Opium debugger extension for constraint
handling rules.



Arguments

Type
   library(chr)

Description
   The query chr_trace.  deactivates the standard or opium debugger.  In
   case of the Opium debugger, its window remains until quited.




Resatisfiable
      No.

Fail Conditions
      None.



Examples
      Success:
[eclipse]: chr_notrace.
yes.
Debugger switched off





See Also
   chr_opium / 0, chr_trace / 0
